item.description: We’ve been invited by the Southeastern CT Singles Assoc. to join them as a guest for $10.  Bring an appetizer, side dish, or dessert, if no food, extra $8.  Reserve by August 1, call 860-447-1650.  Send money to Pat Leach, 26 Meadow Drive, Waterford, CT 06385.  Directions:  I‑95N to Exit 75, ramp end turn right onto Rt. 1N, follow 3.8 miles, right onto Avery Lane (Silver Package Store on corner), 0.3 miles to light, go straight on Rt. 213N (Great Neck Road), follow to stop sign, take right onto Camp Harkness Road, at entrance booth tell them you’re with SCSA and join us at the pavilion.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Summer Picnic
